item.value: ************************************************************************** Welcome to the Decision Deck Server located at Telecom Bretagne. This is the web-service: RORUTA-NecessaryAndPossiblePreferenceRelations-PUT version 1.0 by Pawel Rychly, 2014-2015 ************************************************************************** Return Ticket: gdqScKwlxsoYiVSg Request solution for problem gdqScKwlxsoYiVSg Wrote file:messages.xml Wrote file:necessary-relations.xml Wrote file:possible-relations.xml

setenv PYTHONUNBUFFERED 1 set callXMCDAService="genericXMCDAService.py -U http://server-telecom-bretagne.diviz.org/soap/%s.py -n "
#parameters: parameters.xml cat > parameters.xml <<EOF <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xmcda:XMCDA xmlns:xmcda="http://www.decision-deck.org/2012/XMCDA-2.2.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.decision-deck.org/2012/XMCDA-2.2.0 http://www.decision-deck.org/xmcda/_downloads/XMCDA-2.2.0.xsd">
<methodParameters> <parameter name="strict"> <value> <boolean>true</boolean> </value> </parameter> </methodParameters>
</xmcda:XMCDA> EOF $callXMCDAService RORUTA-NecessaryAndPossiblePreferenceRelations-PUT -S -t 60 -v alternatives:alternatives.xml criteria:criteria.xml performances:performances.xml preferences:preferences.xml intensities-of-preferences:intensities-of-preferences.xml criteria-preference-directions:criteria-preference-directions.xml parameters:parameters.xml

************************************************************************** Welcome to the Decision Deck Server located at Telecom Bretagne. This is the web-service: RORUTA-RepresentativeValueFunction-PUT version 1.0 by Pawel Rychly, 2014-2015 ************************************************************************** Return Ticket: IzshQg2SvD8tjIZ3 Request solution for problem IzshQg2SvD8tjIZ3 Wrote file:messages.xml Wrote file:representative-value-function.xml

setenv PYTHONUNBUFFERED 1 set callXMCDAService="genericXMCDAService.py -U http://server-telecom-bretagne.diviz.org/soap/%s.py -n "
#parameters: parameters.xml cat > parameters.xml <<EOF <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xmcda:XMCDA xmlns:xmcda="http://www.decision-deck.org/2012/XMCDA-2.2.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.decision-deck.org/2012/XMCDA-2.2.0 http://www.decision-deck.org/xmcda/_downloads/XMCDA-2.2.0.xsd">
<methodParameters> <parameter name="strict"> <value> <boolean>true</boolean> </value> </parameter> <parameter name="compromise"> <value> <boolean>false</boolean> </value> </parameter> </methodParameters>
</xmcda:XMCDA> EOF $callXMCDAService RORUTA-RepresentativeValueFunction-PUT -S -t 60 -v alternatives:alternatives.xml criteria:criteria.xml performances:performances.xml necessary-relations:necessary-relations.xml preferences:preferences.xml intensities-of-preferences:intensities-of-preferences.xml criteria-preference-directions:criteria-preference-directions.xml parameters:parameters.xml

<infile>alternatives.xml</infile> </input> <input type="file" x="50" y="175" name="" id="1"> <infile>criteria.xml</infile> </input> <input type="file" x="50" y="250" name="" id="2">
